import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../../Components/EditProfile/EditProfile.css' import '../../Components/DataProfile/DataProfile.css' function Profile() { const [toEditUserInfo, setToEditUserInfo] = useState(false) const [profileData, setProfileData] = useState({ displayedName: '', aboutMe: '', favorite: '', caloriesGoal: '', timeGoal: '' }) function handleChange(event) { const { name, value, type } = event.target setProfileData(prevFormData => ({ ...prevFormData, [name]: value })) } function handleEditUserInfo(event) { setToEditUserInfo(prevState => !prevState) } function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault() } return (
{toEditUserInfo ?
:

Profile

About Me
My Favorite Sport
}
) } export default Profile;
